scripts.cover: yarn run pretest:dynamodb-local && cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=test nyc gulp -LLLL --color test && yarn run kill:dynamodb-local
scripts.deploy: if [ -z "$NODE_ENV" ]; then cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=dev yarn run deploy; else yarn run deploy:$NODE_ENV; fi;
scripts.deploy:dev: sls create_domain --stage $NODE_ENV --region us-east-1 && sls deploy --conceal --stage $NODE_ENV --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:prd: sls create_domain --stage $NODE_ENV --region ca-central-1 && sls deploy --conceal --stage $NODE_ENV --region ca-central-1
scripts.kill:dynamodb-local: if [ -f /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.service.dynamo.pid ]; then echo "Killing dynamodb-local (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.service.dynamo.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.service.dynamo.pid"; kill -9 `cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.service.dynamo.pid`; rm /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.service.dynamo.pid; fi;
scripts.prepare: yarn run snyk-protect && sls dynamodb install
scripts.pretest:dynamodb-local: yarn run kill:dynamodb-local && yarn run start:dynamodb-local && echo "Started dynamodb-local (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.service.dynamo.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.service.dynamo.pid";
scripts.preuninstall: yarn run preuninstall:dynamodb && yarn run clean
scripts.start:dynamodb-local: yarn sls dynamodb install && yarn run start:dynamodb-local:start && yarn run start:dynamodb-local:migrate
scripts.test: yarn run pretest:dynamodb-local && yarn run test:actual
